verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> Then David זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This ה֔וּא <WH1931> he בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> This [is] the house יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וְזֶה־ <WH2088> and this מִּזְבֵּ֥חַ <WH4196> and this [is] the altar לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> for Israel ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> commanded דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> And David לִכְנוֹס֙ <WH3664> to gather together אֶת־ <WH853> הַגֵּרִ֔ים <WH1616> the strangers אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> that [were] in the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <WH5975> and he set חֹֽצְבִ֗ים <WH2672> masons לַחְצוֹב֙ <WH2672> to hew אַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> stones גָזִ֔ית <WH1496> wrought לִבְנ֖וֹת <WH1129> to build בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וּבַרְזֶ֣ל ׀ <WH1270> iron לָ֠רֹב <WH7230> in abundance לַֽמִּסְמְרִ֞ים <WH4548> for the nails לְדַלְת֧וֹת <WH1817> for the doors הַשְּׁעָרִ֛ים <WH8179> of the gates וְלַֽמְחַבְּר֖וֹת <WH4226> and for the joinings הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> prepared דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> And David וּנְחֹ֥שֶׁת <WH5178> and brass לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> in abundance אֵ֥ין <WH369> without מִשְׁקָֽל׃ <WH4948> without weight

וַעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> trees אֲרָזִ֖ים <WH730> Also cedar לְאֵ֣ין <WH369> beyond מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> number כִּֽי <WH3588> for הֵ֠בִיאוּ <WH935> brought הַצִּֽידֹנִ֨ים <WH6722> for the Zidonians וְהַצֹּרִ֜ים <WH6876> and they of Tyre עֲצֵ֧י <WH6086> wood אֲרָזִ֛ים <WH730> cedar לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> much לְדָוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> to David פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֗יד <WH1732> And David שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> Solomon בְנִי֮ <WH1121> my son נַ֣עַר <WH5288> [is] young וָרָךְ֒ <WH7390> and tender וְהַבַּ֜יִת <WH1004> and the house לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> [that is] to be builded לַיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> for the LORD לְהַגְדִּ֨יל ׀ <WH1431> magnifical לְמַ֜עְלָה <WH4605> [must be] exceeding לְשֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> of fame וּלְתִפְאֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH8597> and of glory לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> throughout all countries אָכִ֥ינָה <WH3559> I will [therefore] now make preparation נָּ֖א <WH4994> now ל֑וֹ וַיָּ֧כֶן <WH3559> prepared דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> for it So David לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> abundantly לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> his death

וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> Then he called לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> for Solomon בְנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וַיְצַוֵּ֙הוּ֙ <WH6680> and charged לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> him to build בַּ֔יִת <WH1004> an house לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> And David לִשְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> to Solomon [בְּנֹו כ] (בְּנִ֕י <WH1121> afflicted ק) אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> with לְבָבִ֔י <WH3824> as for me it was in my mind לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֔יִת <WH1004> an house לְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> unto the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> came עָלַ֤י <WH5921> But דְּבַר־ <WH1697> But the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> came to me saying דָּ֤ם <WH1818> blood לָרֹב֙ <WH7230> abundantly שָׁפַ֔כְתָּ <WH8210> Thou hast shed וּמִלְחָמ֥וֹת <WH4421> wars גְּדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> great עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> and hast made לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> thou shalt not build בַ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> an house לִשְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> unto my name כִּ֚י <WH3588> because דָּמִ֣ים <WH1818> blood רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> much שָׁפַ֥כְתָּ <WH8210> because thou hast shed אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> upon the earth לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> in my sight

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold בֵ֞ן <WH1121> Behold a son נוֹלָ֣ד <WH3205> shall be born לָ֗ךְ ה֤וּא <WH1931> who יִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> shall be a אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to thee who shall be a man מְנוּחָ֔ה <WH4496> of rest וַהֲנִח֥וֹתִי <WH5117> and I will give him rest ל֛וֹ מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אוֹיְבָ֖יו <WH341> from all his enemies מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> shall be Solomon יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> for his name וְשָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> peace וָשֶׁ֛קֶט <WH8253> and quietness אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and I will give עַל־ <WH5921> unto יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> unto Israel בְּיָמָֽיו׃ <WH3117> in his days

הֽוּא־ <WH1931> He יִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> He shall build בַ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> an house לִשְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> for my name וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לִּ֣י לְבֵ֔ן <WH1121> and he shall be my son וַאֲנִי־ <WH589> I ל֖וֹ לְאָ֑ב <WH1> and I [will be] his father וַהֲכִ֨ינוֹתִ֜י <WH3559> and I will establish כִּסֵּ֧א <WH3678> the throne מַלְכוּת֛וֹ <WH4438> of his kingdom עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> over Israel עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now בְנִ֔י <WH1121> Now my son יְהִ֥י <WH1961> become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> that וְהִצְלַחְתָּ֗ <WH6743> be with thee and prosper וּבָנִ֙יתָ֙ <WH1129> thou and build בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> as he hath said עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> concerning

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Only יִֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> give לְּךָ֤ יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Only the LORD שֵׂ֣כֶל <WH7922> thee wisdom וּבִינָ֔ה <WH998> and understanding וִֽיצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> and give thee charge עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> concerning Israel וְלִשְׁמ֕וֹר <WH8104> that thou mayest keep אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> the law יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then תַּצְלִ֔יחַ <WH6743> Then shalt thou prosper אִם־ <WH518> if תִּשְׁמ֗וֹר <WH8104> if thou takest heed לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> to fulfil אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> the statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> and judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> charged יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses עַל־ <WH5921> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> with concerning Israel חֲזַ֣ק <WH2388> be strong וֶאֱמָ֔ץ <WH553> and of good courage אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> dread וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תֵּחָֽת׃ <WH2865> not nor be dismayed

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold בְעָנְיִ֜י <WH6040> Now behold in my trouble הֲכִינ֣וֹתִי <WH3559> I have prepared לְבֵית־ <WH1004> for the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD זָהָ֞ב <WH2091> of gold כִּכָּרִ֤ים <WH3603> talents מֵֽאָה־ <WH3967> an hundred אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand וְכֶ֗סֶף <WH3701> of silver אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> and a thousand אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand כִּכָּרִ֔ים <WH3603> talents וְלַנְּחֹ֤שֶׁת <WH5178> and of brass וְלַבַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> and iron אֵ֣ין <WH369> beyond מִשְׁקָ֔ל <WH4948> without weight כִּ֥י <WH3588> are in לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> for it is in abundance הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> become וְעֵצִ֤ים <WH6086> timber וַאֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> also and stone הֲכִינ֔וֹתִי <WH3559> have I prepared וַעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and you תּוֹסִֽיף׃ <WH3254> and thou mayest add

וְעִמְּךָ֤ <WH5973> there לָרֹב֙ <WH7230> with thee in abundance עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> accomplish מְלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> for every manner of work חֹצְבִ֕ים <WH2672> hewers וְחָרָשֵׁ֥י <WH2796> and workers אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> of stone וָעֵ֑ץ <WH6086> and timber וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חָכָ֖ם <WH2450> and all manner of cunning men בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every מְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> of work

לַזָּהָ֥ב <WH2091> Of the gold לַכֶּ֛סֶף <WH3701> the silver וְלַנְּחֹ֥שֶׁת <WH5178> and the brass וְלַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> and the iron אֵ֣ין <WH369> there מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> [there is] no number ק֣וּם <WH6965> Arise וַעֲשֵׂ֔ה <WH6213> [therefore] and be doing וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> also

וַיְצַ֤ו <WH6680> also commanded דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> David לְכָל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעְזֹ֖ר <WH5826> to help לִשְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <WH8010> Solomon בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> is not יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> [Is] not the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> not וְהֵנִ֥יחַ <WH5117> with you? and hath he [not] given you rest לָכֶ֖ם מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> every כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> into בְּיָדִ֗י <WH3027> into mine hand אֵ֚ת <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְנִכְבְּשָׁ֥ה <WH3533> is subdued הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> and the land לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> and before עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> his people

עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now תְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> Now set לְבַבְכֶם֙ <WH3824> your heart וְנַפְשְׁכֶ֔ם <WH5315> and your soul לִדְר֖וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God וְק֗וּמוּ <WH6965> arise וּבְנוּ֙ <WH1129> therefore and build אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְדַּשׁ֙ <WH4720> ye the sanctuary יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God לְהָבִ֞יא <WH935> to bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּכְלֵי֙ <WH3627> vessels קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> and the holy הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> into the house הַנִּבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> that is to be built לְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> to the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ
